file_content.text: You! So you... uhhh! You made it after all. I hoped your head would be Nalen's trophy by now.
I came here to... prove myself. To Nalen. But the traps....
It doesn't matter. You're the enemy; if I can still... hold a blade, I can stick you in the heart!
No living creature's suffering can be ignored.
I will not fight one who is injured.
Mercy leads to a spiral of destruction. You don't belong here.
Your ignorance should devour you. But, all things in time.
That makes you my enemy. Sparing you will only lead to greater destruction.
Ah, a disciple of Rajivari after all.
Go now. You've earned the right.
